channel.title: Daily on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Daily on A Hugo website

item.title: New Blog
item.description: This is my new blog. I am tired of using HTML and writing the CSS. I am now using Hugo and Github Pages. This is a different experience than the normal Hugo + Github Pages, since this is also powered by RMarkdown, which means I can writing blog in Rstudio and also Rmarkdown is friendly to our statistics student because of the R. For instance: # Define 2 vectors cars <- c(1, 3, 6, 4, 9) trucks <- c(2, 5, 4, 5, 12) # Graph cars using a y axis that ranges from 0 to 12 plot(cars, type="o", col="blue", ylim=c(0,12)) # Graph trucks with red dashed line and square points lines(trucks, type="o", pch=22, lty=2, col="red") # Create a title with a red, bold/italic font title(main="Autos", col.
